data.name: exitDiplomacy1
data.value: That's it. Goodbye.

data.name: exitDiplomacy2
data.value: That's it. Goodbye, $LEADER0.

data.name: exitDiplomacy3
data.value: I'm all done. Farewell, $LEADER0.

data.name: declareWar1
data.value: You fool! Prepare for WAR!

data.name: declareWar2
data.value: That's it! Prepare for WAR!

data.name: declareWar3
data.value: We grow tired of your insolence. Prepare for WAR!

data.name: autoRetreatTroops1
data.value: Oops... Er, bad maps. Sorry. (Your troops will move automatically)

data.name: autoRetreatTroops2
data.value: Our mistake. (Your troops will move automatically)

data.name: autoRetreatTroops3
data.value: My bad! (Your troops will move automatically)

data.name: tradeWorldMaps1
data.value: Would you like to trade World Maps?

data.name: tradeWorldMaps2
data.value: Care to trade World Maps?

data.name: tradeWorldMaps3
data.value: Trade World Maps?

data.name: proposeNegotiation1
data.value: Friend $LEADER0, We would like to offer you a deal...

data.name: proposeNegotiation2
data.value: We would like to propose a deal...

data.name: proposeNegotiation3
data.value: We wish to propose a deal...

data.name: backoutFromNegotiation1
data.value: Sorry. Never mind...

data.name: backoutFromNegotiation2
data.value: Never mind...

data.name: backoutFromNegotiation3
data.value: Forget it.

data.name: passiveRetreatTroops1
data.value: We were conducting uh... 'routine training missions.' (Yeah: that's the ticket!)

data.name: passiveRetreatTroops2
data.value: We apologize for the mistake. We will move our troops out of your territory.

data.name: passiveRetreatTroops3
data.value: We will move our troops immediately.

data.name: refuseTribute1
data.value: You make us laugh! Take your threats elsewhere.

data.name: refuseTribute2
data.value: Take your empty threats elsewhere.

data.name: refuseTribute3
data.value: We will not surrender to blackmail.

data.name: giveTribute1
data.value: Very well. We will give you what you want - this time.

data.name: giveTribute2
data.value: We will give you what you want - this time.

data.name: giveTribute3
data.value: $LEADER0, We agree to your demands. For now.

data.name: threatenWarForBorderInvasion
data.value: Remove your forces from our territory or declare WAR!

data.name: warningForBorderInvasion1
data.value: Your forces are within our borders! You must withdraw them.

data.name: warningForBorderInvasion2
data.value: Your forces are within our borders! They MUST be withdrawn!

data.name: warningForBorderInvasion3
data.value: Your forces are within our borders! Withdraw them NOW!

data.name: offerRightOfPassage1
data.value: Shall we agree to a right of passage agreement?

data.name: offerRightOfPassage2
data.value: We could agree to a right of passage agreement.

data.name: offerRightOfPassage3
data.value: What about a right of passage agreement?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyDuringWar1
data.value: We seem to have overextended ourselves. Would you be willing to sign a peace treaty?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyDuringWar2
data.value: We seem to have overextended ourselves. Would you care to sign a peace treaty?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyDuringWar3
data.value: We seem to have overextended ourselves. Will you sign a peace treaty?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyCityInvasion1
data.value: Our troops are approaching $CITY0. Perhaps you would like to discuss peace terms?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyCityInvasion2
data.value: Our troops approach $CITY0. Do you wish to discuss peace terms?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyCityInvasion3
data.value: Our troops approach $CITY0. I urge you to discuss peace terms while there is time.

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyGeneralInvasion1
data.value: Our troops are approaching your cities. Perhaps you would like to discuss peace terms?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyGeneralInvasion2
data.value: Our troops approach your cities. Do you wish to discuss peace terms?

data.name: offerPeaceTreatyGeneralInvasion3
data.value: Our troops approach your cities. I urge you to discuss peace terms while there is still time.

data.name: askForLoan
data.value: Grant us a loan of gold?

data.name: userOffer1
data.value: Will you kindly accept this deal?

data.name: userOffer2
data.value: Will you accept this deal, $LEADER0?

data.name: userOffer3
data.value: Will you accept this deal?

data.value: Please accept this gift as a token of friendship and goodwill.

data.name: userGift2
data.value: I offer you this gift as a token of goodwill.

data.name: userGift3
data.value: Accept this gift as a token of goodwill.

data.name: demandTribute1
data.value: I must demand that you accept this deal.

data.name: demandTribute2
data.value: Accept this deal or pay the consequences!

data.name: demandTribute3
data.value: Take this deal or suffer!

data.value: Friend, what do you want for $GIVE0?

data.value: What may I trade you for $GIVE0?

data.name: askForCounterOffer3
data.value: What do you want for $GIVE0?
